attributes.action: Allow Creation of a new skatepark in Tewkesbury Gloucestershire,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This skatepark we would feel should be what the local BMXers, Skateboarders etc feel is needed as a way to make it good, we have 2 in tewkesbury, 1 mini ramp, then a skatepark which 5 yr olds use, we think the one we have should be like cheltenham (pittville) or even indoor like Newport Skate Extreme (south wales). 

there are many people who would use this, in tewkesbury and other areas in gloucestershire, also increase local economy as people who come to use it will also go round the town looking in the local shops,
